title: $:/plugins/kookma/thinkup
name: Thinkup
description: The Zettelkasten method of note taking with Tiddlywiki
author: Mohammad Rahmani
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/buttons/side-by-side/close": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/buttons/side-by-side/close", "caption": "{{$:/core/images/close-button}} {{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}}", "created": "20200525073739149", "description": "{{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}}", "modified": "20210831192727015", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\whitespace trim\n<$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class=<>>\n <$list filter=\"[match[yes]]\">\n {{$:/core/images/close-button}}\n \n <$list filter=\"[match[yes]]\">\n \n <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}}/>\n \n \n\n <$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/side-by-side\" tags=\"\" />\n <$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth\" text=\"350px\" />\n \n <$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856\" text=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/side-by-side\" />\n <$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/side-by-side\" text=\"\" />\n" }, "list-before": "$:/core/ui/Buttons/close", "modified": "20210831193421604", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewToolbar $:/tags/EditToolbar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\whitespace trim\n\\define side-by-side-body()\n{{$(currentTiddler)$ || $:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/newxx }}\n\\end\n\n\n\\define pinActions()\n <$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/side-by-side\" tags=\"$:/tags/SideBar\" />\n\t\t<$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/side-by-side\" caption=\"Pinned\" />\n <$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarwidth\" text=\"630px\" />\n <$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/state/sidebar\" text=\"yes\" />\n <$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/state/tab/sidebar--595412856\" text=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/side-by-side\" />\n <$action-setfield $tiddler=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/side-by-side\" text=<> />\n\\end\n\n\n<$button message=\"tm-close-tiddlerxx\" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Thinkup/Hint/Pin}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Thinkup/Caption/Pin}} class=<>>\n<$list filter=\"[match[yes]]\">\n{{$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/images/side-by-side}}\n\n<$list filter=\"[match[yes]]\">\n\n<$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Thinkup/Caption/Pin}}/>\n\n\n<>\n\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/config/node-explorer": { "text": "{\n \"display\": \"table\",\n \"visibility\": \"closed\",\n \"tagging\": \"yes\",\n \"backlinks\": \"yes\",\n \"transclusion\": \"yes\",\n \"links\": \"yes\"\n}", "type": "application/json", "created": "20210803175705000", "modified": "20210907184618375", "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/config/node-explorer" }, "20210801192651059", "modified": "20210907185546521", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\import [[$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/utility]]\n\n\\define xtext-pattern-transclude() {{.*}}\n\n\\define text-pattern-transclude()\n{{$(currentTiddler)$.*}}\n\\end\n\n\\define linksFilter() [all[current]!is[system]links[]]\n\\define backlinksFilter() [all[current]!is[system]backlinks[]]\n\\define tagsFilter() [all[current]!is[system]tagging[]]\n\\define transclusionFilter() [regexp:text]\n\n<$set name=mainfilter filter=\"[getindex[links]match[yes]then] [getindex[backlinks]match[yes]then] [getindex[tagging]match[yes]then] [getindex[transclusion]match[yes]then]\">\n\n\n<$list filter=\"[subfilter] +[count[]compare:number:gteq[1]]\" variable=null>\n\n\n<$macrocall \n $name=details \n label=\"Node Explorer\"\n status={{{ [getindex[visibility]] ~[[open]] }}}\n labelClass=\"alert alert-secondary py-1 my-2\"\n srcClass =\"alert border-secondary py-0\"\n src={{$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/ui/node-explorer}}\n />\n\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/tag-cloud": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/tag-cloud", "created": "20210831144029397", "modified": "20210831144728179", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define getTags()\n<$list filter=\"[all[tiddlers]!prefix[$:/]tags[]] +[!prefix[$:/]] $(extra_filter)$\">\n <$text text=\"[[\"/>{{{ [tagging[]count[]] }}}°≈°<><$text text=\"]]\"/>\n\n\\end\n\n\\define sortTags()\n<$list filter=\"[enlist!sortan[]] :filter[split[°≈°]first[]compare:integer:gteq<__n__>]\" >\n <$list filter=\"[split[°≈°]last[]]\"><$text text=\"[[\"/><><$text text=\"]]\"/>\n\n\\end\n\n\\define tagcloud_showbycount(n:5, extrafilter:\"\")\n<$vars extra_filter=<<__extrafilter__>> >\n<$wikify name=\"items\" text=<> >\n <$wikify name=\"sorted\" text=<> >\n <$list filter=<>>\n <$vars count={{{ [tagging[]count[]] }}}>\n <><>\n \n \n \n\n\n\\end\n\n\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/utility": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/utility", "created": "20210803141955154", "modified": "20210803142046058", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define tidNodeExplorerConfig() $:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/config/node-explorer" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/readme", "created": "20210512185940327", "modified": "20210512185942636", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "; Shiraz[use correct name]\ndescribe what is the plugin in one paragraph\n\n;Code and demo\nFor learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages\n\n* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-???/\n* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-???\n" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/side-by-side": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/side-by-side", "caption": "Pinned", "created": "20210803195829638", "modified": "20210907183744864", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/styles/node-explorer.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/styles/node-explorer.css", "text": "/* reset the KaTeX equation numbering when tiddler is displayed through node explorer inside another tiddler - see Shiraz and KaTeX plugins for details*/\n\n.shiraz-dtable-expanded-record{ counter-reset: katexEqnNo; }\n\n\n", "created": "20210918195951960", "modified": "20210918200245010", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/css" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/styles/side-by-side.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/styles/side-by-side.css", "created": "20200525085622139", "modified": "20210831192647840", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "div.tc-tiddler-body.tc-reveal a.tc-tiddlylink {\n color: <>;\n}\n\ndiv.tc-tiddler-body.tc-reveal {\n\tcolor: <>;\n}\n\n/* there is an error with color on plugin page */" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/styles/tag-cloud.css": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/styles/tag-cloud.css", "text": ".kk-tu-sp{\nmargin-bottom:10px;\ndisplay:inline-block;\n}\n\n.kk-tu-sp2 {\n font-size:0.85em;\n\tfont-weight:400;\n\tcolor:blue;\n}", "created": "20210831144440205", "modified": "20210831144717058", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/css" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/templates/sidebar": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/templates/sidebar", "created": "20210425110058007", "modified": "20210512190851324", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define createItem()\n <$action-sendmessage \n $message=\"tm-new-tiddler\" \n title=<> \n tags=\"[[$(currentTiddler)$]]\" \n text=<>\n />\n\\end\n\n\n\\define newItem()\n<$vars new-item-title={{{ [removesuffix[s]] ~[] }}}>\n<$button actions=<> class=\"btn btn-sm\" >\nNew <>\n\n\n\\end\n\n<$tiddler tiddler=<>>\n
\n<>\n
\n\n<$list filter=\"[tag]\" template=\"$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate\"/>\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/ui/ControlPanel/Settings": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/ui/ControlPanel/Settings", "caption": "Thinkup", "created": "20210801161108093", "list-after": "$:/core/ui/ControlPanel/Settings/TiddlyWiki", "modified": "20210907184418636", "tags": "$:/tags/ControlPanel/SettingsTab $:/tags/MoreSideBar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\import [[$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/utility]]\n\nThese settings let you customise the behaviour of Thinkup plugin.\n\n---\n\n;Show Thinkup setting in more sidebar\n:<$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/ui/ControlPanel/Settings\" tag=\"$:/tags/MoreSideBar\"> Show setting in more sidebar\n\n---\n\n;Node explorer switch\n:<$checkbox tiddler=\"$:/state/thinkup/show-node-explorer\" field=\"text\" checked=hide> Disable node explorer\n\n<$reveal type=match stateTitle=\"$:/state/thinkup/show-node-explorer\" stateField=\"text\" text=\"show\" default=show>\n\n;Node filters (show/hide in node explorer)\n:<$checkbox tiddler=<> index=\"links\" checked=yes> links\n:<$checkbox tiddler=<> index=\"backlinks\" checked=yes> backlinks\n:<$checkbox tiddler=<> index=\"tagging\" checked=yes> tagging\n:<$checkbox tiddler=<> index=\"transclusion\" checked=yes> transclusion\n\n;Node explorer display format\n:<$radio tiddler=<> index=\"display\" value=table> dynamic table \n:<$radio tiddler=<> index=\"display\" value=flat > simple flat list\n\n;Default content visibility\n:<$radio tiddler=<> index=\"visibility\" value=closed > closed \n:<$radio tiddler=<> index=\"visibility\" value=open > open \n" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/ui/node-explorer": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/ui/node-explorer", "created": "20210801184619692", "modified": "20210803153028486", "tags": "", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\n<$reveal type=match stateTitle=<> stateIndex=display default=table text=table tag=div>\n<$macrocall $name=table-dynamic \n filter=<>\n fields=\"tbl-expand title tbl-linktype tags created\" \n class=\"w-100\"\n editButton=no\n/>\n\n\n\n<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<> stateIndex=display default=table text=table tag=div>\n<$list filter=\"[subfiltersort[title]butlast[]]\"><$link/> | \n<$list filter=\"[subfiltersort[title]last[]]\"><$link/>\n" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/ui/sidebar": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/ui/sidebar", "caption": "Thinkup", "created": "20210425103526384", "list": "Ideas Questions Experiments Bibliography ToDo", "modified": "20210831192545988", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "Think Up: Use one's ingenuity to invent or devise something [[Lexico|https://www.lexico.com/definition/think_up]]\n<$macrocall $name=tabs tabsList=\"[all[tiddlers+shadows]tag[$:/tags/Thinkup]!has[draft.of]]\" default=\"Ideas\" class=\"tc-vertical\"/>" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/newxx": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/newxx", "created": "20210803195528481", "modified": "20210831192845036", "tags": "show-content", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define folded-state()\n$:/state/folded/$(currentTiddler)$\n\\end\n\\define cancel-delete-tiddler-actions(message) <$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-$message$-tiddler\"/>\n\\import [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/Macro/View]!has[draft.of]]\n<$vars storyTiddler=<> tiddlerInfoState=<>>
> data-tags={{!!tags}} class={{{ tc-tiddler-frame tc-tiddler-view-frame [is[tiddler]then[tc-tiddler-exists]] [is[missing]!is[shadow]then[tc-tiddler-missing]] [is[shadow]then[tc-tiddler-exists tc-tiddler-shadow]] [is[shadow]is[tiddler]then[tc-tiddler-overridden-shadow]] [is[system]then[tc-tiddler-system]] [{!!class}] [tags[]encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-tagged-]] +[join[ ]] }}}><$list filter=\"[list[$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/side-by-sidex]] [all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/ViewTemplate]!has[draft.of]] -[[$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/title]] \" variable=\"listItem\"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>\n
\n\n" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/node-explorer": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/node-explorer", "created": "20210501201700405", "modified": "20210803140751818", "tags": "$:/tags/ViewTemplate", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "<$reveal type=match stateTitle=\"$:/state/thinkup/show-node-explorer\" stateField=text default=show text=show>\n<$transclude tiddler=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/macros/node-explorer\"/>\n" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/side-by-side-title": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/side-by-side-title", "created": "20200525073529278", "modified": "20210831192727007", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\whitespace trim\n\\define title-styles()\nfill:$(foregroundColor)$;\n\\end\n\\define config-title()\n$:/config/ViewToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(listItem)$\n\\end\n
\n
\n\n<$list filter=\"$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/buttons/side-by-side/close\" variable=\"listItem\"><$reveal type=\"nomatch\" state=<> text=\"hide\"><$set name=\"tv-config-toolbar-class\" filter=\"[] [encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-btn-]]\"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>\n\n<$set name=\"tv-wikilinks\" value={{$:/config/Tiddlers/TitleLinks}}>\n<$link>\n<$set name=\"foregroundColor\" value={{!!color}}>\n>>\n<$transclude tiddler={{!!icon}}>\n<$transclude tiddler={{$:/config/DefaultTiddlerIcon}}/>\n\n\n\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]removeprefix[$:/]]\">\n

\n$:/<$text text=<>/>\n

\n\n<$list filter=\"[all[current]!prefix[$:/]]\">\n

\n<$view field=\"title\"/>\n

\n\n\n\n
\n\n<$reveal type=\"nomatch\" text=\"\" default=\"\" state=<> class=\"tc-tiddler-info tc-popup-handle\" animate=\"yes\" retain=\"yes\">\n\n<$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerInfoSegment]!has[draft.of]] [[$:/core/ui/TiddlerInfo]]\" variable=\"listItem\"><$transclude tiddler=<> mode=\"block\"/>\n\n\n
" }, "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/side-by-sidex": { "title": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/side-by-sidex", "created": "20200525074313554", "list": "$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/side-by-side-title $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/subtitle $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/classic $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/import $:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/plugin $:/ak/plugins/TWCrossLinks/ui/footer.kwd", "modified": "20210831192002025", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "\\define folded-state()\n$:/state/folded/$(currentTiddler)$\n\\end\n\n<$vars storyTiddler=<> tiddlerInfoState=<>>
> data-tags={{!!tags}} class={{{ tc-tiddler-frame tc-tiddler-view-frame [is[tiddler]then[tc-tiddler-exists]] [is[missing]!is[shadow]then[tc-tiddler-missing]] [is[shadow]then[tc-tiddler-exists tc-tiddler-shadow]] [is[shadow]is[tiddler]then[tc-tiddler-overridden-shadow]] [is[system]then[tc-tiddler-system]] [{!!class}] [tags[]encodeuricomponent[]addprefix[tc-tagged-]] +[join[ ]] }}}>\n <$list filter=\"[list[$:/plugins/kookma/thinkup/viewtemplates/side-by-sidex]]\" variable=\"listItem\"><$transclude tiddler=<>/>\n
\n\n\n\n" } } }
